<template>
  <form>
    <input
      v-bind:value="title"
      class="input"
      type="text"
      placeholder="gffdsf"
    >
    <button @click.prevent="createPlaylist">Создать</button>
  </form>
</template>

<script>
  export default {
    props: {
      playlists: {
        type: Array,
        required: true
      }
    }
  }
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
